JAPN 101.name: Elementary Japanese I
JAPN 101.description: The fundamentals of Japanese through listening, speaking, reading, and writing.

JAPN 102.name: Elementary Japanese II
JAPN 102.description: The fundamentals of Japanese through listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Practice in pronunciation and development of comprehension.

JAPN 231.name: Intermediate Japanese I
JAPN 231.description: A thorough review of grammar, vocabulary building, conversation, composition, and reading.
